permitHolder: EPISCOPAL SOCIAL SERVICES OF NEW YORK INC

latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Passed inspection with no violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection child care service failed to provide sufficient lighting and or failed to maintain adequate foot candles in areas used by children
Child care service observed utilizing chairs and other equipment not of suitable size for children in attendance on day of inspection
Adequate lighting not provided in food prep area at time of inspection Foods observed not protected from contamination from light fixture/bulb damage at time of inspection

violations.Violation Summary: Permittee failed to submit permit renewal application at least 90 days prior to permit expiration date
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations
